apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the kiss between two people emoji, featuring light and medium-dark skin tones, is rendered with tender affection and a warm, romantic glow. The figures are depicted with Appleâ€™s characteristic smooth gradients and soft rounded edges, creating a gentle, intimate embrace, while subtle highlights suggest a shared moment of tenderness. This emoji powerfully conveys love, romance, and deep affection between two individuals, perfect for expressing heartfelt sentiments in messages to loved ones.
